title: Client Crashing is Crashing my League of Legends experience
body: Okay so I've pretty given up all hope on the current league client it crashes nonstop and it also crashes during ranked q's today its crashed twice during a ranked q losing me 15 lp in total but the second time now its making me wait 30 mins to play again. When its not even my fault but i always log back in on time and it just treats me logging back into my account as dodging instead of just bringing me back to the q. Its really dumb and I want change.{{champion:121}}

replies.body:
While I cannot alter your LP, I can assist you in troubleshooting this issue. Disconnections or crashes during champ select or while sitting in queue are often caused by your client losing its connection to the game platform service entirely. I recommend checking out our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in investigating this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.

Are you Windows 10 user? Have you tried this:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update

It's most likely your fault. Millions of players are doing fine without posting on the Boards. Queue dodging and LP are never altered, so fix the issue before resuming ranked games.
